Package main

The main package contains classes that control the execution flow of the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm. It includes the entry point for running the algorithm, parameter reading and management, and message printing.

The main classes in this package are:

  • Main: The main class for running the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm. It initializes the necessary components, such as the ant colony and event manager, and runs the simulation.
    • main(String[] args): The entry point for running the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm. It reads the command line arguments, initializes the necessary components, and starts the simulation.
  • ParameterReader: A class for reading and storing the parameters from the command line arguments or an input file. It provides methods to retrieve the parameter values for different components of the algorithm.
  • MessageError: A utility class for printing error messages and correct usage instructions. It includes methods to display error messages and provide guidance on correct command usage.
  • CmdTextFormatter: A class that defines ANSI escape sequences for text formatting in the command line. It provides constants for text styling, such as bold, underline, and colors.
  • ConsolePrinter: A class that implements the Printer interface and provides functionality for printing text to the console.
  • PrinterController: A class that provides functionality for printing text to both the console and a file. It supports different printer types, such as console-only, file-only, or both.
  • FilePrinter: A class that implements the Printer interface and provides functionality for printing text to a file.
  • Printer: An interface that defines methods for printing text.
  • PrinterType: An enum that represents the type of printer to use (CONSOLE, FILE, or BOTH).

By utilizing the classes in this package, the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm can be executed and controlled with the provided parameters, and relevant messages can be printed for user interaction and feedback.

Authors:

  • Ana Ferreira
  • Diogo Neves
  • Madalena Barros
